name: Stoke The Fire
description: This game is about keeping your fire alive cut down trees and put them in your fire before it dies. After a selected amount of time you will be victorious... Recommended playtime: 300 secs for the best experience Recommended play time for least amount of bordem but far less challenge and fun: 150 secs. And 60 secs to check out the game but not really have fun with it.
